title: Burgers dynamics for Poisson point process initial conditions of the Weibull class
summary: We derive the statistical properties of one-dimensional Burgers dynamics with stochastic initial conditions for the velocity potential defined by a Poisson point process whose intensity follows a power law with exponent $α> -1$. Working in the inviscid limit and exploiting the geometrical construction of solutions in terms of first-contact parabolas, we derive explicit analytical expressions for a broad set of statistical quantities. These include the one- and two-point probability distributions of the velocity, the multiplicity functions of voids and shocks, and the velocity and density correlation functions together with their associated power spectra. We also show that the full hierarchy of $n$-point distributions factorizes into a sequence of two-point conditional probabilities. This class of initial conditions leads to self-similar evolution and produces probability distributions characterized by stretched-exponential tails, with tail exponents spanning the full range from unity to infinity. The associated characteristic length scale grows as a power law of time, with an exponent lying between zero and one half.

AI.tldr: 研究一维Burgers方程在泊松点过程随机初始条件下的统计特性，推导出速度、空隙、激波等统计量的解析表达式，发现自相似演化和拉伸指数尾分布。
AI.motivation: 研究随机初始条件下Burgers湍流的统计特性，特别是泊松点过程初始条件如何影响动力学演化和统计分布。
AI.method: 在无粘极限下，利用首接触抛物线的几何构造方法，推导速度、空隙、激波等统计量的解析表达式。
AI.result: 得到了速度的一点和两点概率分布、空隙和激波的多样性函数、速度和密度相关函数及其功率谱的显式解析表达式；发现n点分布可分解为两点条件概率序列；初始条件导致自相似演化，产生具有拉伸指数尾的概率分布。
AI.conclusion: 泊松点过程初始条件产生自相似的Burgers动力学，统计分布具有拉伸指数尾特征，特征长度尺度随时间呈幂律增长。

title: Evolution of the pseudogap and excess conductivity of YBa$_2$Cu$_3$O$_{7-δ}$ single crystals in the course of long-term aging
summary: The temperature dependences of both fluctuation conductivity (FLC) $σ^\prime(T)$ and pseudogap (PG) $Δ^*(T)$ derived from measurements of resistivity $ρ(T)$ of an optimally doped YBa$_2$Cu$_3$O$_{7-δ}$ single crystal subjected to long-term storage have been studied. The as-grown sample S1 exhibits characteristics typical of optimally doped YBa$_2$Cu$_3$O$_{7-δ}$ single crystals containing twins and twin boundaries. Analysis of both FLC and PG showed an unexpected improvement in all characteristics of the sample after 6 years of storage (sample S2), indicating that the effect of twin boundaries is somehow limited. After 17 years of storage, all characteristics of the sample changed dramatically, which indicates a strong influence of internal defects formed during the aging process. For the first time, the temperature dependences of both FLC and PG were obtained after 17 years of storage.

AI.tldr: 研究通过测量长期储存的YBa₂Cu₃O₇-δ单晶电阻率，分析了涨落电导率和赝隙的温度依赖性，发现储存时间对样品特性有显著影响。
AI.motivation: 研究长期储存对高温超导体YBa₂Cu₃O₇-δ单晶性能的影响，特别是储存过程中内部缺陷的形成如何改变涨落电导率和赝隙特性。
AI.method: 通过测量不同储存时间（新鲜样品、6年储存、17年储存）的YBa₂Cu₃O₇-δ单晶的电阻率温度依赖性，从中提取涨落电导率和赝隙的温度依赖关系进行分析。
AI.result: 1. 新鲜样品表现出典型的含孪晶和孪晶界的特性；2. 储存6年后所有特性意外改善，表明孪晶界影响有限；3. 储存17年后所有特性显著改变，显示老化过程中形成的内部缺陷产生强烈影响；4. 首次获得了储存17年后的涨落电导率和赝隙温度依赖关系。
AI.conclusion: 长期储存显著影响YBa₂Cu₃O₇-δ单晶的超导特性，老化过程中形成的内部缺陷对涨落电导率和赝隙行为有决定性影响，这对理解高温超导体的长期稳定性和缺陷效应具有重要意义。

title: Current-controlled creations, deletions, and topological transformations of a single magnetic antiskyrmion in nanostructured cells
summary: Topological magnetic solitons have emerged as promising candidates for information carriers in spintronic devices, thanks to their fascinating electromagnetic properties. For fundamental device applications, the ability to electrically manipulate individual solitons is crucial. However, electrical manipulation of single antiskyrmions has been rarely demonstrated. In this work, we present current-controlled manipulations, encompassing the creation, deletion, and topological transformation of a single antiskyrmion within FeNiPdP nanostructured cells at room temperature. This nanostructure is uniquely designed with dimensions of about 400 nm in width and length, enabling the stabilization of a single antiskyrmion. By simply adjusting the density of nanosecond single-pulsed currents, we achieve the reversible creation and deletion of single antiskyrmions. Moreover, we uncover a rich variety of current-controlled topological transformations among individual antiskyrmions, skyrmions, bubbles, and ferromagnetic states. Our experimental findings are corroborated by micromagnetic simulations, highlighting the pivotal role of current-induced combined effects, such as spin transfer torque and Joule heating. Our results hold potential for advancing antiskyrmion-based device applications.

AI.tldr: 该研究实现了室温下单个反斯格明子的电流操控，包括创建、删除和拓扑转换，为反斯格明子器件应用奠定了基础。
AI.motivation: 拓扑磁孤子（如反斯格明子）在自旋电子器件中具有重要应用前景，但单个反斯格明子的电操控能力尚未得到充分验证，这限制了其实际器件应用。
AI.method: 设计约400nm宽长的FeNiPdP纳米结构单元，通过调节纳秒单脉冲电流密度，结合微磁模拟验证电流诱导的自旋转移力矩和焦耳热效应。
AI.result: 成功实现了单个反斯格明子的可逆创建和删除，并观察到丰富的电流控制拓扑转换（反斯格明子、斯格明子、磁泡和铁磁态之间的相互转换）。
AI.conclusion: 该研究展示了单个反斯格明子的全电操控能力，为基于反斯格明子的信息存储和逻辑器件开发提供了重要基础。

title: Auto-3DPFM: Automating Polarization-Vector Mapping at the Nanoscale
summary: The functional properties of ferroelectric materials are strongly influenced by ferroelectric polarization orientation; as such, access to consistent and precise characterization of polarization vectors is of substantial importance to ferroelectrics research. Here, we develop a fully automated three-dimensional piezoresponse force microscopy (Auto-3DPFM) technique automating all essential steps in interferometric PFM for 3D polarization vector characterization, including laser alignment, tip calibration and approach, image acquisition, polarization vector reconstruction, and visualization. The automation reduces the experimental burden of ferroelectric polarization vector characterization, while the back-and-forth calibration ensures consistency and reproducibility of 3D polarization reconstruction. An algorithmic workflow is also developed to identify domain walls and calculate their characteristic angles via a spatial vector-angle-difference method, presenting one unique capability enabled by Auto-3DPFM that is not accessible with traditional PFM techniques. Beyond representing a significant step forward in 3D polarization mapping, Auto-3DPFM promises to accelerate discovery via high-throughput and autonomous characterization in ferroelectric materials research. When integrated with machine learning and adaptive sampling strategies in self-driving labs, Auto-3DPFM will serve as a valuable tool for advancing ferroelectric physics and microelectronics development.

AI.tldr: 开发了全自动三维压电力显微镜技术，自动化了铁电材料三维极化矢量表征的所有关键步骤，提高了实验效率和结果一致性。
AI.motivation: 铁电材料的性能受极化方向影响很大，但传统PFM技术需要大量人工操作，缺乏一致性和可重复性，限制了铁电材料研究的发展。
AI.method: 开发了Auto-3DPFM技术，自动化了激光对准、针尖校准、样品接近、图像采集、极化矢量重建和可视化等所有关键步骤。还开发了算法工作流来识别畴壁并计算其特征角度。
AI.result: 该技术显著减少了铁电极化矢量表征的实验负担，通过往返校准确保了三维极化重建的一致性和可重复性。能够识别畴壁并计算特征角度，这是传统PFM技术无法实现的独特能力。
AI.conclusion: Auto-3DPFM代表了三维极化映射的重要进展，有望通过高通量和自主表征加速铁电材料研究。与机器学习和自适应采样策略结合后，将成为推进铁电物理和微电子发展的重要工具。

title: Contrasting magnetic behavior in MnSc_2X_4 (X = S, Se) spinel compounds investigated by magnetoelastic studies
summary: The spinel compounds MnSc_2X_4 are highly frustrated and candidate materials for vortex-like 3q magnetic states, such as skyrmions, with propagation vectors in the [111] plane. Because of the strong magnetoelastic coupling, we could extract a refined magnetic (H, T) phase diagram for MnSc_2S_4 from ultrasound and dilatometry measurements. We found a variety of magnetic phases, including the skyrmion phase, which is stable down to lowest temperatures. In comparison, we investigated MnSc_2Se_4 , having a larger distance between the magnetic Mn^3+ ions using the same methods. Unlike in MnSc_2S_4 , we found no skyrmion phase and overall a lack of sharp anomalies indicative of phase transitions, neither in dilatometry nor ultrasound nor in specific heat and ac-susceptibility data. Motivated by our findings, we performed model calculations, which reproduced the experimentally observed magnetostriction and specific-heat results reasonably well.

AI.tldr: MnSc₂S₄具有稳定的斯格明子相，而MnSc₂Se₄则没有斯格明子相，磁相变特征不明显
AI.motivation: 研究MnSc₂X₄系列化合物的磁相图，特别是斯格明子相的存在与稳定性，探索磁弹性耦合对磁相的影响
AI.method: 通过超声波、膨胀测量、比热和ac-磁化率等实验方法测量磁相图，并结合模型计算验证实验结果
AI.result: MnSc₂S₄具有丰富的磁相，包括稳定到低温的斯格明子相；而MnSc₂Se₄没有斯格明子相，相变特征不明显
AI.conclusion: MnSc₂S₄和MnSc₂Se₄的磁行为差异表明，磁性离子间距和磁弹性耦合强度对斯格明子相的形成和稳定性有重要影响

title: Superconductivity and geometric superfluid weight of a tunable flat band system
summary: We study superconductivity and superfluid weight of the two-dimensional $α$-$\mathcal{T}_3$ lattice with on-site asymmetries, hosting an isolated quasi-flat band with tunable bandwidth via a parameter $α$. Within a mean-field approximation of the attractive Hubbard model, we obtain the superconducting order parameters on the three inequivalent sublattices and show their strong dependence on $α$, interaction strength, and electron filling. At quasi-flat band filling, a superconducting gap opens and grows power-law fast with interaction strength, instead of the usual slow exponential growth, due to diverging density of states. We calculate the superfluid weight from linear response theory and study its band dispersion and geometric contributions. While the conventional part proportional to band derivatives is suppressed in the quasi-flat band regime, the contribution dominated by the quantum metric grows linearly for small interaction strength. We further demonstrate how tuning $α$ enhances the quantum metric and thus the geometric superfluid weight especially near half-filling, while increasing on-site asymmetries increases the conventional contribution by broadening the quasi-flat band. We obtain the Berezinskii-Kosterlitz-Thouless transition temperature and demonstrate its strong dependence and enhancement with the parameter $α$. Our results establish a tunable flat band system, the $α$-$\mathcal{T}_3$ lattice model, as a candidate for tunable quantum geometry and superfluid weight and as a prototype of related behavior in tunable quantum materials.

AI.tldr: 研究二维α-T₃晶格中超导性和超流权重，重点关注准平带中的量子几何效应和可调谐特性
AI.motivation: 探索具有可调谐准平带的α-T₃晶格系统，研究其超导特性如何受量子几何效应影响，特别是超流权重中的几何贡献部分
AI.method: 采用平均场近似处理吸引Hubbard模型，计算三个不等价子晶格上的超导序参数；基于线性响应理论计算超流权重，分离能带色散贡献和几何贡献
AI.result: 在准平带填充下，超导隙随相互作用强度呈幂律快速打开（而非通常的指数缓慢增长）；量子几何主导的超流权重在小相互作用下线性增长；调节α参数可增强量子度量和几何超流权重，特别是在半填充附近
AI.conclusion: α-T₃晶格模型作为可调谐量子几何和超流权重的候选系统，展示了量子几何在增强超导特性中的重要作用，为相关量子材料提供了原型

title: Creating and Deleting a Single Dipolar Skyrmion by Surface Spin Twists
summary: We report deterministic operations on single dipolar skyrmions confined in nanostructured cuboids using in-plane currents. We achieve highly reversible writing and deleting of skyrmions in the simple cuboid without any artificial defects or pinning sites. The current-induced creation of skyrmions is well-understood through the spin-transfer torque acting on surface spin twists of the spontaneous 3D ferromagnetic state, caused by the magnetic dipole-dipole interaction of the uniaxial Fe3Sn2 magnet with a low-quality factor. Current-induced deletions of skyrmions result from the combined effects of magnetic hysteresis and Joule thermal heating. Our results are replicated consistently through 3D micromagnetic simulations. Our approach offers a viable method for achieving reliable single-bit operations in skyrmionic devices for applications such as random-access memories.

AI.tldr: 该论文展示了在纳米结构立方体中使用面内电流对单个偶极斯格明子进行确定性操作，实现了高度可逆的写入和删除，为斯格明子器件提供了可靠的单比特操作方法。
AI.motivation: 开发可靠的单比特操作方法对于斯格明子器件（如随机存取存储器）的实际应用至关重要。传统方法通常需要人工缺陷或钉扎位点，而本研究旨在探索无需这些辅助结构的简单几何结构中实现确定性斯格明子操作。
AI.method: 使用面内电流在纳米结构立方体中对单个偶极斯格明子进行操作。通过自旋转移力矩作用于由磁偶极-偶极相互作用引起的自发3D铁磁态表面自旋扭曲来实现斯格明子创建。斯格明子删除则通过磁滞和焦耳热加热的联合效应实现。所有结果通过3D微磁模拟进行验证。
AI.result: 在简单立方体结构中实现了高度可逆的斯格明子写入和删除操作，无需任何人工缺陷或钉扎位点。电流诱导的斯格明子创建机制得到明确解释，删除过程也得到合理解释。实验结果与3D微磁模拟结果一致。
AI.conclusion: 该方法为斯格明子器件（如随机存取存储器）实现可靠的单比特操作提供了可行途径，展示了在简单几何结构中无需辅助结构即可实现确定性斯格明子操作的潜力。

title: A physics-augmented neural network framework for modeling and detecting thermo-visco-plastic behavior
summary: Although considerable attention has been devoted to the development of models for isothermal, rate-independent plasticity, many high-consequence performance assessments involve viscoplastic processes that generate substantial heat. In addition, materials may transit from a nearly isothermal, rate-independent regime to a viscous, temperature-dependent regime during these processes, which makes modeling more challenging. In this work, we develop a physics-augmented neural network (PANN) framework for modeling general temperature-dependent, rate-dependent inelastic processes firmly based on physical principles, including the second law of thermodynamics and coordinate equivariance. These embedded properties are enabled by a number of architectural innovations in the structure and training of an input convex and potential-based neural ordinary differential equation framework. The resulting neural network models are capable of representing a wide spectrum of rate- and temperature-dependence ranging from isothermal, rate-independent elastic-plastic phenomenology to rate-dependent fully viscous inelastic behavior, as we demonstrate. We also show that the framework is capable of modeling complex microstructural inelasticity and predicting the conversion of plastic work to heating when calibrated to stress-temperature observations.

AI.tldr: 开发了一个基于物理增强神经网络（PANN）的框架，用于建模温度依赖、速率依赖的非弹性过程，该框架嵌入热力学第二定律和坐标等变性等物理原理。
AI.motivation: 许多高性能评估涉及产生大量热量的粘塑性过程，材料可能在等温、速率无关状态和粘性、温度依赖状态之间转换，这使得建模更具挑战性。现有模型主要关注等温、速率无关塑性，难以处理这种复杂转变。
AI.method: 采用物理增强神经网络框架，通过输入凸性和基于势能的神经常微分方程架构创新，嵌入热力学第二定律和坐标等变性等物理原理，确保模型符合基本物理规律。
AI.result: 该神经网络模型能够表示从等温、速率无关弹塑性现象到速率依赖完全粘性非弹性行为的广泛速率和温度依赖行为，并能建模复杂微观结构非弹性，预测塑性功转化为热量的过程。
AI.conclusion: 提出的PANN框架为建模一般温度依赖、速率依赖的非弹性过程提供了物理基础坚实的方法，能够处理材料在不同状态间的复杂转变，具有广泛的应用潜力。

title: Modeling the dynamics of trapped electrons in quantum dots
summary: We analyze the effects of electron-electron and electron-phonon interactions in the dynamics of a system of two or three electrons that can be trapped to a localized state and detrapped to ab extended band states of a quantum dot using a simple model. In spite of its simplicity the time dependent problem has no analytical solution but a numerically exact one can be found at a relatively low computational cost. Within this model, we study the time evolution of the electron occupancies of conduction and valence bands and the trap state, as well as the statistical factors influencing light emission of different energies. In most of the analyzed cases, the system dynamics has a very short transient determined by the hopping parameters, that can be of tens of femptoseconds,followed by a quasi-stationary regime in which the electron occupancies either oscillate periodically around their time-averaged values or remain nearly constant. We find signatures of strong electronic correlations in the electronic motion for negative values of the effective electron-electron Coulomb interaction that are not translated to the statistical factors for light emission. Our calculations show that light emission of different energies is always possible except in the especial cases in which the valence band is initially filled with two electrons. In these cases the valence band can lose and recover electrons periodically but exciton emission is negligible at any time. We use this fact to attempt to give a possible explanation for the increase in the intensity of exciton emission with the concomitant decrease in the intensity of the green emission lines upon continuous illumination with ultraviolet radiation, experimentally observed for ZnO nanoparticles suspended in an alcohol.

AI.tldr: 研究量子点中电子-电子和电子-声子相互作用对电子动力学的影响，分析不同能量光发射的统计因子，为ZnO纳米颗粒实验现象提供解释
AI.motivation: 研究量子点系统中电子-电子和电子-声子相互作用对电子动力学的影响，特别是对光发射统计因子的影响，为解释ZnO纳米颗粒在紫外连续照射下激子发射增强而绿光发射减弱的实验现象提供理论依据
AI.method: 使用简单模型分析两个或三个电子在局域态和扩展带态之间的俘获和去俘获过程，通过数值精确解研究时间演化，分析导带、价带和陷阱态的电子占据以及不同能量光发射的统计因子
AI.result: 系统动力学具有由跳跃参数决定的短暂瞬态过程（数十飞秒），随后进入准稳态；发现强电子关联对电子运动有显著影响，但不会转化为光发射统计因子；除价带初始填充两个电子的特殊情况外，不同能量的光发射总是可能的
AI.conclusion: 该模型为解释ZnO纳米颗粒在紫外连续照射下激子发射增强而绿光发射减弱的实验现象提供了可能的理论解释，表明价带初始填充两个电子时激子发射可忽略，而其他情况下不同能量的光发射都可能发生

title: Single-crystalline high-quality beta-Ga2O3 pseudo-substrate on sapphire through sputtering for epitaxial deposition
summary: Solid-phase epitaxy (SPE) of beta-Ga2O3 thin films by radio-frequency (RF) sputtering and then crystallized through high-temperature post-deposition annealing is employed on sapphire substrates, yielding a high-quality pseudo-substrate for subsequent buffer growth via MOCVD and LPCVD. Low roughness (<0.5 nm) and sharp single-crystalline diffraction peaks corresponding to the (-201), (-402), and (-603) reflections of beta-Ga2O3 were observed in the SPE beta-Ga2O3 film and the subsequent epitaxial buffer layer. N-doped Ga2O3 film on SPE Ga2O3 film grown by LPCVD showed step-assisted growth mode with reasonable electronic behavior with 45 cm^2/V-s mobility at a bulk carrier concentration of 1.3e17 cm^-3. These results suggest that SPE Ga2O3 is a promising pathway to advance the development of beta-Ga2O3 on foreign substrates.

AI.tldr: 利用射频溅射和高温退火在蓝宝石衬底上制备β-Ga2O3薄膜，通过固相外延获得高质量伪衬底，用于后续MOCVD/LPCVD缓冲层生长，实现了低粗糙度和良好电学性能。
AI.motivation: 开发在异质衬底上生长高质量β-Ga2O3薄膜的方法，以推进β-Ga2O3功率电子器件的发展，解决传统方法在异质衬底上生长质量不佳的问题。
AI.method: 采用射频溅射在蓝宝石衬底上沉积β-Ga2O3薄膜，然后通过高温后退火实现固相外延结晶。以此作为伪衬底，再通过MOCVD和LPCVD生长缓冲层和掺杂薄膜。
AI.result: 获得了低粗糙度(<0.5 nm)的β-Ga2O3薄膜，观察到尖锐的单晶衍射峰。LPCVD生长的N掺杂Ga2O3薄膜表现出台阶辅助生长模式，电子迁移率达到45 cm²/V·s，载流子浓度为1.3×10¹⁷ cm⁻³。
AI.conclusion: 固相外延β-Ga2O3是在异质衬底上制备高质量β-Ga2O3薄膜的有效途径，为β-Ga2O3功率电子器件的进一步发展提供了有前景的技术路线。

title: Controlling Skyrmion Lattices via Strain: Elongation, Tilting, and Collapse Mechanisms
summary: This study establishes a comprehensive framework for the three-dimensional strain control of magnetic skyrmion strings. We integrate analytical modeling, micromagnetic simulations, and \textit{in situ} Lorentz transmission electron microscopy experiments to demonstrate that externally applied strain is a powerful stimuli for manipulating three-dimensional magnetic skyrmion strings. Analytical models predict that strain induces both elongation and bidirectional tilting of skyrmion strings in bulk systems, a finding corroborated by numerical simulations. These simulations further reveal that strain drives the system from fragmented multi-domain states toward unified single-domain configurations and facilitates skyrmion string rupture via bobber formation at critical strain levels. The collapse of the skyrmion lattice exhibits a temperature-dependent character, shifting from first-order to second-order behavior near the critical temperature $T_c$. Reducing sample thickness significantly increases the critical strain required for annihilation due to the suppression of tilting. Experimental validation on a $\text{Co}_8\text{Zn}_{8.5}\text{Mn}_{3.5}$ sample confirms strain-induced elongation and subsequent collapse into a conical phase via anti-cluster formation, directly implicating strain-modulated Dzyaloshinskii-Moriya interaction (DMI) as the primary mechanism in this system, over magnetocrystalline anisotropy. These findings provide a mechanistic understanding of strain-mediated control in three-dimensional magnetic systems, demonstrating its feasibility for energy-efficient spintronic applications.

AI.tldr: 该研究建立了三维磁斯格明子弦的应变控制框架，通过理论模型、模拟和实验证明应变可有效操纵三维磁斯格明子弦，为节能自旋电子学应用提供新途径。
AI.motivation: 开发三维磁斯格明子弦的有效控制方法，探索应变作为外部刺激对三维磁系统的调控能力，为节能自旋电子学应用奠定基础。
AI.method: 结合解析建模、微磁模拟和原位洛伦兹透射电子显微镜实验，在Co8Zn8.5Mn3.5样品上验证应变对三维磁斯格明子弦的调控效果。
AI.result: 应变引起斯格明子弦的伸长和双向倾斜；驱动系统从碎片化多畴态向统一单畴态转变；临界应变下通过气泡形成导致弦断裂；晶格崩塌呈现温度依赖性相变行为；样品厚度减小抑制倾斜，提高临界应变；实验证实应变诱导伸长并通过反团簇形成塌陷为锥形相。
AI.conclusion: 应变主要通过调制Dzyaloshinskii-Moriya相互作用调控三维磁斯格明子弦，而非磁晶各向异性，为三维磁系统的应变控制提供了机制理解，展示了其在节能自旋电子学应用中的可行性。

title: Translating Chirality into Multidirectional Motion through Broadband Chiroptical MXenes
summary: The integration of chirality into functional materials enables control of light-matter interactions beyond binary illumination (on/off). Conventional photoactuators rely on binary modulation, limiting them to unidirectional motion. In contrast, we introduce a ternary optical logic paradigm where actuation direction is encoded by the handedness of circularly polarized light (CPL). Here, we establish a chiral Ti$_{3}$C$_{2}$T$_{x}$ MXene platform bridging molecular chirality and mechanical actuation. Phenylalanine enantiomers are covalently anchored onto MXene nanoflakes via chiral nanopainting. The 2D confinement forces ligands into vertically aligned supramolecular networks. Interlayer-spacing analysis and simulations corroborate that such supramolecular networks unlock exceptionally broadband circular dichroism from the ultraviolet to the near-infrared. This supramolecular chirality synergizes with MXene's plasmonic properties to drive handedness-dependent photothermal conversion, with a 30\% differential temperature rise between matched and mismatched CPL. Embedding this chiral MXene into thermoresponsive hydrogels realizes, to the best of our knowledge, the first CPL-driven soft actuator that implements LCP/RCP/off as a ternary input to program multidirectional deformation based on a photothermal mechanism. This molecular-to-macroscopic translation demonstrates a new paradigm for chirality-encoded soft robotics and adaptive photonics.

AI.tldr: 该研究开发了一种基于手性Ti3C2Tx MXene的三元光学逻辑软致动器，利用圆偏振光的手性编码实现多方向形变控制。
AI.motivation: 传统光致动器依赖二元调制（开/关），只能实现单向运动，限制了光控软机器人的功能。需要开发能够响应光手性信息、实现多方向形变的新型智能材料。
AI.method: 通过手性纳米绘画技术将苯丙氨酸对映体共价锚定在MXene纳米片上，形成垂直排列的超分子网络。将这种手性MXene嵌入热响应水凝胶中，利用其手性依赖的光热转换特性驱动形变。
AI.result: 实现了从紫外到近红外的超宽带圆二色性，匹配/不匹配圆偏振光下产生30%的温差差异。成功制备了首个基于圆偏振光驱动的软致动器，实现了LCP/RCP/关的三元输入控制多方向形变。
AI.conclusion: 该工作建立了从分子手性到机械致动的桥梁，展示了手性编码软机器人和自适应光子学的新范式，为超越二元逻辑的光控智能材料开辟了新途径。

title: Gate tuning of coupled electronic and structural phase transition in atomically thin Ta$_2$NiSe$_5$
summary: Realizing an excitonic insulator phase from narrow-gap semiconductors remains challenging, as unambiguous experimental signatures are difficult to establish. Ta$_2$NiSe$_5$ has been widely regarded as a leading candidate, yet the nature of its phase transition and insulating state remains controversial. Here, we report a systematic Raman spectroscopy study of Ta$_2$NiSe$_5$ as a function of thickness and field-effect doping, complemented by electrical transport measurements. The phase transition persists down to the monolayer limit, with the critical temperature increasing as thickness decreases. In bilayer samples, both electron and hole doping suppress the insulating state, with electron doping lowering and hole doping raising the transition temperature. Importantly, the quasi-elastic scattering, previously attributed to excitonic fluctuations, evolves monotonically across the entire doping range, inconsistent with the expected suppression of excitonic correlations by Coulomb screening. These findings rule out a dominant excitonic mechanism and instead point to a coupled electronic and structural phase transition, whose stability is tunable by carrier doping. Our doping-based approach offers a general strategy for evaluating the role of excitonic effects in candidate excitonic insulators.

AI.tldr: 通过厚度和掺杂调控研究Ta2NiSe5的相变机制，发现其绝缘态并非主要由激子机制主导，而是电子-结构耦合相变。
AI.motivation: 激子绝缘体相的实现面临实验验证困难，Ta2NiSe5作为主要候选材料，其相变本质和绝缘态性质存在争议，需要明确其物理机制。
AI.method: 采用系统拉曼光谱研究不同厚度和场效应掺杂下的Ta2NiSe5，结合电输运测量，分析相变行为和准弹性散射特征。
AI.result: 相变在单层极限下仍存在，临界温度随厚度减小而升高；电子和空穴掺杂均抑制绝缘态，但准弹性散射在掺杂范围内单调演化，与激子关联被库仑屏蔽的预期不符。
AI.conclusion: 实验结果排除了主导的激子机制，表明Ta2NiSe5的相变是电子和结构耦合的相变，其稳定性可通过载流子掺杂调控，为评估激子绝缘体候选材料提供了通用策略。

title: Kerr effect induced by exchange interaction of electrons separated by a tunnel barrier in a double quantum well
summary: In a structure with two tunnel-coupled quantum wells of different widths, the spin dynamics resulting from resonant pulsed optical pumping of the narrow-well exciton includes the wide-well electron magnetization dynamics. Our analysis shows that the effect is driven by electron exchange between narrow-well excitons and spin-polarized electrons in the wide well. A theoretical model of the spin Kerr effect has been developed accounting for the interwell electron spin exchange. In the studied double-well structure with CdTe and Cd$_{0.98}$Mn$_{0.02}$Te quantum wells and a well-separating barrier thickness of 5 monolayers (1.6 nm), the model accurately describes the experimental results and allows us to estimate the interwell electron exchange constant as $δ_{e} \approx 0.9\times10^{-15}~\textrm{eV}~\textrm{cm}^{2}$.

AI.tldr: 在双量子阱结构中，通过光学泵浦窄阱激子，可以驱动宽阱电子磁化动力学，这是由窄阱激子与宽阱自旋极化电子之间的电子交换驱动的。
AI.motivation: 研究双量子阱结构中不同宽度量子阱之间的自旋动力学耦合机制，特别是窄阱激子如何影响宽阱电子自旋，这对于理解量子阱间的自旋交换过程具有重要意义。
AI.method: 开发了考虑阱间电子自旋交换的自旋Kerr效应理论模型，并在CdTe/CdMnTe双量子阱结构（势垒厚度1.6nm）中通过共振脉冲光学泵浦窄阱激子进行实验验证。
AI.result: 理论模型准确描述了实验结果，并估算出阱间电子交换常数为δ_e ≈ 0.9×10^{-15} eV·cm^2，表明窄阱激子与宽阱自旋极化电子之间存在有效的电子交换。
AI.conclusion: 双量子阱结构中窄阱激子与宽阱电子之间的电子交换是驱动宽阱电子磁化动力学的关键机制，该发现为量子阱间自旋操控提供了新途径。

title: Electrical Characterization of High-k (k>115) Crystalline SrTiO3 (STO) thin film integration with GaN with Nanomembrane Transfer Process
summary: High-k (115), crystalline SrTiO3 (STO) thin film was transferred on GaN for potential applications in power devices (transistor and diodes) by nanomembrane transfer method and the detailed electrical properties such as leakage current, CV profiles, dielectric constant, frequency dispersion was reported from fabricated MOSCAP structures. The leakage current was negligible (under noise-level of tool) up to 6 V and 11 V for 50 nm and 200 nm STO membrane respectively A high-quality dielectric was indicated by the CV profile, which showed almost negligible frequency dispersion in the frequency range of 10 kHz to 500 kHz. The dielectric constant was 50 to 82 with the 50 nm thick STO membrane and 115 to 186 in the 200 nm thick STO membrane. Thermal annealing of the membrane in ambient conditions at 250 degrees for 2 hours led to a slight improvement in the dielectric constant (8 to 20 percent), albeit at the expense of degraded leakage current performance, as indicated by a reduction of 1 V to 3 V in the "no leakage region" of the IV curves after annealing. The possible physical mechanisms responsible for these changes were also analyzed and discussed.

AI.tldr: 通过纳米膜转移方法将高k值SrTiO3薄膜转移到GaN上，用于功率器件应用，研究了其电学特性，发现不同厚度STO膜具有优异的介电性能和泄漏电流特性，热退火会改善介电常数但降低泄漏性能。
AI.motivation: 开发用于功率器件（晶体管和二极管）的高质量介电材料，通过将高k值SrTiO3薄膜转移到GaN衬底上，研究其电学性能以评估在功率器件中的应用潜力。
AI.method: 采用纳米膜转移方法将结晶性SrTiO3薄膜转移到GaN衬底上，制备MOSCAP结构，测量泄漏电流、CV特性、介电常数和频率色散等电学参数，并对薄膜进行热退火处理（250°C，2小时）研究性能变化。
AI.result: 50nm和200nm STO薄膜的泄漏电流在6V和11V以下均可忽略；CV特性显示几乎无频率色散（10kHz-500kHz）；介电常数分别为50-82和115-186；热退火使介电常数提高8-20%，但泄漏性能下降（"无泄漏区"电压降低1-3V）。
AI.conclusion: 纳米膜转移的SrTiO3/GaN结构展现出优异的高k介电性能，适用于功率器件应用，但热退火处理需要在介电常数改善和泄漏性能下降之间进行权衡，并需要进一步分析其物理机制。

title: The Impact of Magnons, Defects, and Rapid Energy Migration on the Optical Properties of the 2D Magnet CrPS4
summary: Strong coupling between optical and magnetic excitations could enable contactless, spatially resolved, or ultrafast interrogation and control of magnetism two-dimensional (2D) materials and devices. The layered 2D A-type antiferromagnet CrPS4 stands out among van der Waals (vdW) magnets for its rich optical fine structure, but its spectroscopy is not yet understood and has so far been interpreted without consideration of magnetic exchange. Here, we show that this fine structure comes primarily from exchange-mediated coupling between on-site optical "spin-flip" transitions of Cr3+ and low-energy spin transitions involving the surrounding lattice. Well-resolved magnon sidebands to optical 4A2 <--> 2E transitions are observed in photoluminescence (PL) and PL excitation spectra, as well as a pronounced PL sideband due to short-range exchange splitting. Energy migration is probed using Yb3+ dopants as traps, revealing sub-picosecond inter-site excitation hopping. Formation of dispersive Frenkel excitons of coupled on-site d-d transitions due to inter-site exchange is discussed. In addition to impacting how optical fine structure is interpreted in this and potentially other vdW magnets, these findings may have ramifications for future applications of layered 2D magnets by revealing new opportunities to drive mode-specific spin-wave excitations using light.

AI.tldr: CrPS4二维反铁磁体中的光学精细结构源于交换介导的耦合，包括磁子边带和短程交换分裂，揭示了光驱动自旋波激发的可能性。
AI.motivation: 研究二维材料中光与磁激发的强耦合，以实现非接触式、空间分辨或超快磁性的探测与控制。CrPS4具有丰富的光学精细结构，但其光谱尚未被理解，且以往解释未考虑磁交换作用。
AI.method: 使用光致发光(PL)和PL激发光谱观察Cr3+的4A2<-->2E跃迁的磁子边带；通过Yb3+掺杂作为陷阱探测能量迁移；分析短程交换分裂和形成色散Frenkel激子的可能性。
AI.result: 观察到光学跃迁的磁子边带和短程交换分裂引起的PL边带；发现亚皮秒量级的位点间激发跳跃；揭示了交换介导的耦合机制，即Cr3+的"自旋翻转"跃迁与周围晶格低能自旋跃迁的耦合。
AI.conclusion: CrPS4的光学精细结构主要源于交换介导的耦合，这为理解vdW磁体的光学结构提供了新视角，并揭示了利用光驱动特定模式自旋波激发的应用潜力。

title: Unconventional bright ground-state excitons in monolayer TiI$_2$ from first-principles calculations
summary: Based on \textit{ab initio} screened configuration interaction calculations we find that TiI$_2$ has a bright exciton ground state and identify two key mechanisms that lead to this unprecedented feature among transition metal dichalcogenides. First, the spin-orbit induced conduction band splitting results in optically allowed spin-alignment for electrons and holes across a significant portion of the Brillouin zone around the $\mathbf{K}$-valley, avoiding band crossings seen in materials like monolayer MoSe$_2$. Second, a sufficiently weak exchange interaction ensures that the bright exciton remains energetically below the dark exciton state. We further show that the bright exciton ground state is stable under various mechanical strains and that trion states (charged excitons) inherit this bright ground state. Our findings are expected to spark further investigation into related materials that bring along the two key features mentioned, as bright ground-state excitons are crucial for applications requiring fast radiative recombination.

AI.tldr: TiI₂具有明亮的激子基态，这是过渡金属二硫化物中前所未有的特性，由导带自旋轨道分裂和弱交换相互作用两个关键机制导致。
AI.motivation: 寻找具有明亮激子基态的材料对于需要快速辐射复合的应用至关重要，但在过渡金属二硫化物中尚未发现这种特性。
AI.method: 采用从头算筛选的组态相互作用计算，研究TiI₂的电子结构和激子性质。
AI.result: 发现TiI₂具有明亮的激子基态，该特性在多种机械应变下保持稳定，且带电激子（trion）也继承了这一明亮基态。
AI.conclusion: TiI₂的明亮激子基态由自旋轨道诱导的导带分裂和弱交换相互作用共同实现，这一发现将推动对具有类似特性的相关材料的研究。

title: Symmetry-driven giant magneto-optical Kerr effects in altermagnet hematite
summary: Altermagnets have attracted tremendous interest for revealing intriguing physics and promising spintronics applications. In contrast to conventional antiferromagnets, altermagnets break both PT and Tt symmetries, and simultaneously exhibit spin-split band structures with a vanishing net magnetization. To quantify insulating altermagnets without conduction electron, we propose to use magneto-optical Kerr effect (MOKE) to identify the altermagnetic fingerprints. In particular, we demonstrate not only the giant MOKE responses, but also their connection with the orientations of Neel vectors at room temperature in altermagnet hematite alpha-Fe_2O_3. Specifically, under the Neel vector along the [1-100] axis, we find a giant polar Kerr rotation angle 93.4 mdeg in the (11-20) plane, which is allowed by the magnetic space group C2'/c'. Under the Neel vector along the [11-20] axis, we find a longitudinal Kerr angle 9.6 mdeg in the (0001) plane, which is allowed by the magnetic space group C2/c. Further, we show that such pronounced MOKE effects directly enable an optical imaging of altermagnetic domains, together with their reversible domain wall (DW) motion. Our studies not only suggest MOKE can be used to identify altermagnet candidates, but also signify the feasibility of exploring altermagnetic optical and DW spintronics, which could largely expand the current research paradigm of altermagnetism.

AI.tldr: 该论文提出利用磁光克尔效应（MOKE）来识别绝缘性交变磁体，并在α-Fe₂O₃中展示了巨大的MOKE响应及其与奈尔矢量取向的关系，为交变磁体的光学成像和畴壁运动研究提供了新方法。
AI.motivation: 交变磁体具有重要的物理特性和自旋电子学应用前景，但传统反铁磁体不同，交变磁体同时打破PT和Tt对称性，并表现出自旋分裂能带结构且净磁化强度为零。对于没有传导电子的绝缘性交变磁体，需要新的表征方法来识别其交变磁性特征。
AI.method: 提出使用磁光克尔效应（MOKE）作为识别交变磁体指纹的方法。以α-Fe₂O₃为研究对象，计算了在不同奈尔矢量取向下的MOKE响应：当奈尔矢量沿[1-100]轴时，在(11-20)平面测量极向克尔旋转角；当奈尔矢量沿[11-20]轴时，在(0001)平面测量纵向克尔角。
AI.result: 发现了巨大的MOKE响应：在奈尔矢量沿[1-100]轴时，获得了93.4 mdeg的极向克尔旋转角；在奈尔矢量沿[11-20]轴时，获得了9.6 mdeg的纵向克尔角。这些效应允许光学成像交变磁畴及其可逆畴壁运动。
AI.conclusion: MOKE不仅可以用于识别交变磁体候选材料，还为探索交变磁体的光学特性和畴壁自旋电子学提供了可行性，这将大大扩展当前交变磁性的研究范式。

title: Non-Hermitian trapping of Dirac exciton-polariton condensates in a perovskite metasurface
summary: Massless Dirac particles avoid trapping due to their exceptional tunneling properties manifested in the so-called Klein paradox. This conclusion stems from the conservative treatment, but so far, it has not been extended to a non-Hermitian framework. Recently, driven-dissipative bosonic condensation of Dirac exciton-polaritons was demonstrated in metasurface waveguides. Here, we report an experimental observation of spatial binding and energy quantization of Dirac exciton-polaritons in a halide perovskite metasurface. A combination of spatially profiled nonresonant optical excitation and exciton-polariton interaction forms an effective non-Hermitian complex potential responsible for the observed effect. In the case of tightly focused pump spots spanning from 9 to 17~$μ$m, several bound states simultaneously achieve macroscopic occupation, constituting a multi-mode bosonic condensation of exciton-polaritons. Our theoretical analysis based on the driven-dissipative extension of the Dirac equation reveals that the non-Hermitian character of the effective trap allows for confinement even in the case of the gapless Dirac-like photonic dispersion, both above and below the energy of the dispersion crossing.

AI.tldr: 实验观测到卤化物钙钛矿超表面中狄拉克激子极化激元的空间束缚和能量量子化，通过非厄米复势实现多模玻色凝聚
AI.motivation: 传统保守处理认为无质量狄拉克粒子因克莱因佯谬而避免束缚，但这一结论尚未扩展到非厄米框架。最近在超表面波导中实现了狄拉克激子极化激元的驱动耗散玻色凝聚，需要研究非厄米效应下的束缚现象。
AI.method: 使用空间轮廓非共振光学激发和激子极化激元相互作用形成有效非厄米复势，在9-17μm的紧密聚焦泵浦光斑下观测束缚态。理论分析基于狄拉克方程的驱动耗散扩展。
AI.result: 实验观察到多个束缚态同时实现宏观占据，构成激子极化激元的多模玻色凝聚。非厄米有效陷阱特性允许在无间隙狄拉克色散情况下实现束缚，包括色散交叉点上下能量区域。
AI.conclusion: 非厄米有效势能够束缚狄拉克激子极化激元，即使在无间隙狄拉克色散情况下也能实现能量量子化和多模玻色凝聚，扩展了传统克莱因佯谬的结论。

title: Twin Domains in 111 oriented {CdO/MgO} superlattices: homoepitaxy versus heteroepitaxy
summary: The structural properties of (111)-oriented {CdO/MgO} superlattice structures grown on c-sapphire and cubic MgO substrates have been studied by high resolution X-ray diffraction. The growth was performed in a plasma-assisted molecular beam epitaxy system. Although both superlattices are (111)-oriented and the {CdO/MgO} structure has 3m symmetry. It was shown that the superlattice on c-sapphire consists of misoriented domains, whereas no such domains were observed on (111) MgO. The twin domains are rotated by 180° with respect to each other and by 30° with respect to the sapphire substrate. We show that the crucial phenomena based on the formation of rotation domains and their number in heteroepitaxy depend fundamentally on the relationship between substrate and epilayer symmetries.

AI.tldr: 研究通过高分辨率X射线衍射分析了在c-蓝宝石和立方MgO衬底上生长的(111)取向{CdO/MgO}超晶格结构，发现蓝宝石衬底上存在180°旋转的孪晶畴，而MgO衬底上则没有
AI.motivation: 研究不同衬底上(111)取向{CdO/MgO}超晶格结构的结构特性，探究衬底与薄膜对称性关系对旋转畴形成的影响
AI.method: 使用等离子体辅助分子束外延系统生长超晶格，通过高分辨率X射线衍射分析结构特性
AI.result: c-蓝宝石衬底上的超晶格存在180°相互旋转的孪晶畴，且相对于蓝宝石衬底旋转30°；而(111)MgO衬底上没有观察到这种畴结构
AI.conclusion: 异质外延中旋转畴的形成及其数量根本上取决于衬底与薄膜对称性之间的关系

title: Domain Wall Control of Topological Qubits in the Kitaev SSH Chain
summary: Zero energy states in one dimensional SSH Kitaev hybrid systems have emerged as promising candidates for topological qubits. In our work, we show that introducing a domain wall into a chain with anisotropic superconducting correlations provides a powerful way to control both the number and the nature of these boundary modes. The defect acts as a digital knob: its presence or absence flips the parity of zero modes and thus decides whether an isolated Majorana exists at the chain ends. This on/off mechanism is significantly more robust and simpler than fine-tuning global parameters such as chemical potential or hopping amplitudes. Moreover, anisotropy provides an additional lever to calibrate the effect of the defect, opening a pathway to architectures where topological qubits can be locally addressed by domain walls. This proposal reframes defects not as imperfections, but as useful resources for quantum information and computation.

AI.tldr: 在SSH-Kitaev混合系统中引入畴壁可控制拓扑边界态的数量和性质，畴壁作为数字开关决定链端是否存在孤立马约拉纳零模
AI.motivation: 传统通过调节化学势或跃迁振幅等全局参数来控制拓扑零模的方法复杂且不够鲁棒，需要更简单可靠的局部控制机制

AI.conclusion: 缺陷不应被视为瑕疵，而是量子信息处理的有用资源，畴壁架构为拓扑量子比特的局部寻址提供了新途径

title: Transport Novelty Distance: A Distributional Metric for Evaluating Material Generative Models
summary: Recent advances in generative machine learning have opened new possibilities for the discovery and design of novel materials. However, as these models become more sophisticated, the need for rigorous and meaningful evaluation metrics has grown. Existing evaluation approaches often fail to capture both the quality and novelty of generated structures, limiting our ability to assess true generative performance. In this paper, we introduce the Transport Novelty Distance (TNovD) to judge generative models used for materials discovery jointly by the quality and novelty of the generated materials. Based on ideas from Optimal Transport theory, TNovD uses a coupling between the features of the training and generated sets, which is refined into a quality and memorization regime by a threshold. The features are generated from crystal structures using a graph neural network that is trained to distinguish between materials, their augmented counterparts, and differently sized supercells using contrastive learning. We evaluate our proposed metric on typical toy experiments relevant for crystal structure prediction, including memorization, noise injection and lattice deformations. Additionally, we validate the TNovD on the MP20 validation set and the WBM substitution dataset, demonstrating that it is capable of detecting both memorized and low-quality material data. We also benchmark the performance of several popular material generative models. While introduced for materials, our TNovD framework is domain-agnostic and can be adapted for other areas, such as images and molecules.

AI.tldr: 提出TNovD（Transport Novelty Distance）评估指标，基于最优传输理论，同时评估生成材料的质量和新颖性，适用于材料发现中的生成模型评估。
AI.motivation: 随着生成式机器学习在材料发现中的应用日益广泛，现有评估方法往往无法同时捕捉生成结构的质量和新颖性，限制了准确评估生成模型性能的能力。
AI.method: 基于最优传输理论，通过训练集和生成集特征之间的耦合构建TNovD指标，使用阈值将耦合细分为质量和记忆化两个机制。特征通过图神经网络从晶体结构中提取，该网络通过对比学习训练以区分材料、其增强版本和不同尺寸的超晶胞。
AI.result: 在晶体结构预测的典型实验（记忆化、噪声注入和晶格变形）中验证了TNovD的有效性，并在MP20验证集和WBM替代数据集上验证了其检测记忆化和低质量材料数据的能力。还对多个流行的材料生成模型进行了基准测试。
AI.conclusion: TNovD是一个领域无关的框架，能够同时评估生成材料的质量和新颖性，不仅适用于材料科学，还可扩展到图像和分子等其他领域。

title: Reinterpreting Landauer conductance, solving the quantum measurement problem, grand unification
summary: In a series of recent papers we have proved rigorously that time travel is a reality and very much feasible by using quantum mechanical processes. There are plenty of indirect experimental support untill a direct experiment is conducted. The process crucially depend on the reality of a local time as well as a local partial density of states (LPDOS) that can become negative very easily in the quantum regime of mesoscopic systems. Mesoscopic systems are small enough to allow us to experimentally access the intemediate regime between the classical and quantum worlds. This LPDOS is in every sense a hidden variable in quantum mechanics that does not show up in the axiomatic framework of quantum mechanics. It can be infered through physical clocks obeying quantum dynamics and can be rigorously justified from the properties of the Hilbert space that is uniquely isomorphic to the complex plane. Therefore one can naturally guess that LPDOS will have something important to say about quantum measurement as well as the unification of classical and quantum laws. We therefore undertake the exercise to show that LPDOS can very much allow us to re-interpret the enormously successful phenomenological Landauer-Buttiker formalism for mesoscopic systems and put it on firm theoretical ground as a bridge between classical and quantum mechanics, thereby unifying them. Essentialy the local time calculated quantum mechanically can dialate exactly like the proper time of relativity and be consistent with the coordinate time of relativity. Also the measured conductance of mesoscopic samples is a deterministic quantum measurement outcome from a linear superposition of states, essentially because of LPDOS, which solves the quantum measurement problem. For this we analyze the three probe conductance formula in details and give our arguements for the general case.

AI.tldr: 该论文提出通过局域部分态密度(LPDOS)这一量子力学隐藏变量，证明了时间旅行在量子力学中是现实的，并解决了量子测量问题，统一了经典与量子力学。
AI.motivation: 论文的动机是探索量子力学中时间旅行的可能性，并解决量子测量问题。作者发现量子力学公理框架中未出现的LPDOS这一隐藏变量，可能成为连接经典与量子力学的桥梁。
AI.method: 通过分析介观系统中的局域部分态密度(LPDOS)，该变量在量子区域容易变为负值。作者重新解释Landauer-Buttiker唯象形式，将其建立在坚实的理论基础上，并详细分析三探针电导公式。
AI.result: 证明了时间旅行在量子力学中是现实的；量子力学计算的局域时间可以像相对论中的固有时一样膨胀；介观样品的测量电导是量子测量问题的确定性结果；LPDOS解决了量子测量问题。
AI.conclusion: LPDOS作为量子力学中的隐藏变量，不仅证明了时间旅行的现实性，还解决了量子测量问题，并为统一经典力学和量子力学提供了理论桥梁，将Landauer-Buttiker形式建立在更坚实的理论基础之上。

title: Effect of cold rolling strain on the microstructural evolution in equimolar MoNbTaTiZr refractory complex concentrated alloy: Comprehensive characterization
comment: This is a preprint article distributed under the CC-BY license. Manuscript submitted to Materials & Design
summary: This work presents a pilot study on a strained complex concentrated alloy based on refractory elements: MoNbTaTiZr. Initially, the as-cast and homogenization-annealed conditions were characterized. After casting, the alloy consists of two solid solutions with BCC 1 and BCC 2 crystal structures. Homogenization annealing promotes the growth, ordering, and refinement of the BCC 2 phase. TEM and AES analyses indicate possible Zr segregation at grain boundaries in the as-cast state. In contrast, annealing followed by cooling results in the formation of Ti-Zr-based particles without segregation. Subsequently, the annealed alloy was cold-rolled, and its microstructure was investigated. During rolling, grain fragmentation occurs within the structure. In addition to the two BCC solid solutions, a phase with an FCC crystal structure is identified after rolling. Its composition corresponds to the Zr2Ta phase, which is a Laves phase of the A2B type. Rotational relationships, relatively rare in rolled materials with BCC structures, are identified. The texture components found after 10% rolling deformation are related to that present after 20% deformation by a 45 degrees <110> rotation, and this component is related to that appearing after 30% deformation by a 20 degrees <100> rotation. However, no distinct rolling texture or clear texture development was observed, although some mutual relationships among preferred orientations can be identified. Schmid and Taylor factor maps demonstrate that, despite deformation, the alloy remains capable of further strain accumulation and plastic deformation. Twinning is also observed after rolling, which may be beneficial, as deformation twinning contributes to improved ductility in the alloy.

AI.tldr: 对难熔元素基应变复杂浓缩合金MoNbTaTiZr的初步研究，分析了铸态、均匀化退火和冷轧后的微观结构演变、相组成和织构特征。
AI.motivation: 研究难熔元素基复杂浓缩合金（MoNbTaTiZr）在不同加工状态下的微观结构演变，特别是冷轧过程中的相变、织构发展和变形机制，为这类高性能合金的设计和应用提供基础。
AI.method: 采用铸态、均匀化退火和冷轧处理合金样品，通过TEM、AES等分析手段表征微观结构、相组成、晶界偏析和织构特征，并计算Schmid和Taylor因子评估变形能力。
AI.result: 铸态合金包含BCC1和BCC2两种固溶体；退火促进BCC2相生长、有序化和细化；冷轧导致晶粒破碎，出现FCC结构的Zr2Ta Laves相，观察到旋转织构关系和孪晶形成，合金仍保持良好塑性变形能力。
AI.conclusion: MoNbTaTiZr合金在冷轧过程中表现出复杂的微观结构演变，包括相变、织构发展和孪晶形成，这些特征有助于合金的塑性变形能力，为设计具有优异力学性能的难熔复杂浓缩合金提供了重要见解。

title: Magnetic properties of molecular beam epitaxy-grown ultrathin Cr2Ge2Te6 films down to monolayer limit on Si substrates
summary: Cr2Ge2Te6, a prototypical van der Waals ferromagnetic semiconductor, have attracted significant interest for its potential applications in high-performance spintronics. However, the magnetic ground state of monolayer Cr2Ge2Te6 remains elusive due to fragile and irregular-shaped thin flake samples with weak magnetic signals. Here, we successfully grow uniform ferromagnetic Cr2Ge2Te6 films down to monolayer by molecular beam epitaxy. By exploiting a self-limiting growth mode, we achieve synthesis of uniform monolayer Cr2Ge2Te6 films across entire millimeter-scale Si substrates. Through a combination of superconducting quantum interference device magnetometry and anomalous Hall effect measurements, we establish that monolayer Cr2Ge2Te6 exhibits intrinsic ferromagnetism with perpendicular magnetic anisotropy below ~10 K, albeit with strong magnetic fluctuations characteristic of its two-dimensional nature. Furthermore, a systematic thickness-dependent study reveals a crossover from this fluctuation-dominated two-dimensional magnetism turns into conventional long-range ferromagnetic order as the film thickness increases. Our work not only definitively establishes the intrinsic ferromagnetic ground state of monolayer Cr2Ge2Te6, but also provides a scalable, silicon-compatible route for preparing the two-dimensional magnet for future spintronic or quantum devices.

AI.tldr: 成功生长出均匀的单层Cr2Ge2Te6薄膜，证实其具有本征铁磁性（垂直磁各向异性，低于~10K），并观察到从二维磁涨落向传统长程铁磁有序的厚度依赖转变。
AI.motivation: Cr2Ge2Te6作为典型的范德华铁磁半导体在自旋电子学中具有重要应用潜力，但单层样品的磁性基态由于样品脆弱、形状不规则且磁信号弱而一直不明确。
AI.method: 采用分子束外延技术，利用自限制生长模式在毫米级Si衬底上生长均匀的单层Cr2Ge2Te6薄膜，结合超导量子干涉仪磁强计和反常霍尔效应测量进行表征。
AI.result: 单层Cr2Ge2Te6在低于~10K时表现出本征铁磁性和垂直磁各向异性，但具有强烈的二维磁涨落特征。厚度依赖研究表明，随着厚度增加，从涨落主导的二维磁性转变为传统的长程铁磁有序。
AI.conclusion: 不仅明确建立了单层Cr2Ge2Te6的本征铁磁基态，而且提供了一种可扩展、与硅兼容的制备二维磁体的途径，为未来自旋电子学或量子器件应用奠定基础。

title: Structural Phase Transition and Cooperative Luminescence in K3Yb(PO4)2:Eu3+ for Multimodal Down-shifting and Up-converting Luminescence Thermometry
summary: To develop a more universal luminescent thermometer that provides both high relative sensitivity and the ability to measure temperature across different spectral ranges and excitation wavelengths, the K3Yb(PO4)2:Eu3+ system was proposed in this work. It was demonstrated that this material undergoes a structural phase transition from the monoclinic to the hexagonal phase above 450 K. This transition enabled the construction of a ratiometric, phase-transition-based thermometer utilizing the luminescence intensity ratio of Stark lines of Eu3+ and Yb3+ ions, which exhibit SRmax values of 4.2% K^-1 and 1.15% K^-1, respectively. Moreover, increasing the Eu3+ ion concentration was shown to raise the phase transition temperature, thereby shifting the thermal operating range of both luminescent thermometers. Under 980 nm excitation, K3Yb(PO4)2:Eu3+ exhibits both cooperative luminescence from Yb3+ pairs and up-conversion emission from Eu3+ ions. Increasing the Eu3+ concentration enhances the Eu3+ luminescence intensity relative to the cooperative luminescence of Yb3+ pairs, resulting in a change in the emitted light color. The difference in the thermal quenching behavior of these two signals further enabled the development of a ratiometric thermometer with SRmax = 0.58% K^-1. These findings identify K3Yb(PO4)3:Eu3+ as a promising candidate for multimodal temperature sensing.

AI.tldr: 开发基于K3Yb(PO4)2:Eu3+材料的通用型发光温度计，利用相变和不同离子发光特性实现多模式温度传感
AI.motivation: 开发一种更通用的发光温度计，能够在不同光谱范围和激发波长下测量温度，同时具备高相对灵敏度
AI.method: 提出K3Yb(PO4)2:Eu3+系统，利用其在450K以上的单斜相到六方相的结构相变，构建基于Eu3+和Yb3+离子斯塔克线发光强度比的比率型温度计
AI.result: 相变基温度计的最大相对灵敏度分别为4.2% K^-1和1.15% K^-1；增加Eu3+浓度可提高相变温度并改变发光颜色；在980nm激发下开发出SRmax=0.58% K^-1的比率型温度计
AI.conclusion: K3Yb(PO4)3:Eu3+是一种有前景的多模式温度传感候选材料，通过相变和不同发光机制实现了灵活的温度测量

title: Theoretical Characterization of the Magnetic Properties of Vanadium-doped Ti2C MXenes
summary: MXenes are two-dimensional materials composed of transition metals and light elements, known for their high conductivity and versatile surface chemistry. The introduction of spin centers via doping can lead to promising materials for spintronics, magnetic sensing, and data storage. We study the effect of V doping in Ti2C using first principle and Monte-Carlo simulations. Our results show that pristine Ti2C exhibits ferromagnetic intralayer and antiferromagnetic interlayer exchange interactions, yielding an antiferromagnetic ground state. Vanadium incorporation alters these couplings, yet all doped configurations - Ti7VC4 and three Ti6V2C4 variants - retain predominantly antiferromagnetic order. Despite the preserved ground state, V doping enhances the magnetic response, most notably in the p-Ti6V2C4 configuration, which displays increased low-field susceptibility and partial spin alignment across layers. As experimentally isolating individual doped phases is unlikely, samples will consist of mixed configurations whose collective behavior nonetheless exhibits clear signatures of V-induced magnetic modification. These results reveal how transition-metal substitution tunes exchange interactions in MXenes and offer guidance for engineering their magnetic functionalities.

AI.tldr: 研究V掺杂对Ti2C MXene磁性的影响，发现掺杂虽保持反铁磁基态，但增强了磁响应，特别是p-Ti6V2C4构型
AI.motivation: MXenes作为二维材料具有高导电性和可调表面化学性质，通过掺杂引入自旋中心可开发其在自旋电子学、磁传感和数据存储中的应用潜力
AI.method: 采用第一性原理计算和蒙特卡洛模拟研究V掺杂Ti2C，分析Ti7VC4和三种Ti6V2C4变体的磁性
AI.result: 原始Ti2C具有铁磁层内和反铁磁层间交换作用，形成反铁磁基态；V掺杂改变耦合但所有掺杂构型仍保持反铁磁序，其中p-Ti6V2C4构型显示出增强的低场磁化率和部分层间自旋排列
AI.conclusion: 过渡金属掺杂可调控MXenes的交换相互作用，为工程化其磁功能提供指导，实验样品虽为混合构型但仍能显示V诱导的磁改性特征

title: SiNx RRAMs performance with different stoichiometries
summary: The microstructure of SiNx is strongly affected by its stoichiometry, x. The stoichiometry of SiNx thin films can be modified by adjusting the gas flow rates during LPCVD deposition. The deficiency or excess of Si atoms enhance the formation of defects such as nitrogen vacancies, silicon dangling bonds etc., and thus can enable performance tuning of the resulting MIS RRAM devices. DC electrical characterization, impedance spectroscopy and constant voltage stress measurements were carried out to investigate the properties of non-stoichiometric silicon nitride films as resistive switching material. The average SET time for each device was measured by applying voltage ramps. Improvement in the SET/RESET voltages and SET time is observed. Finally, the stoichiometric film exhibits the lowest breakdown acceleration factor, while the Si-rich film the highest.

AI.tldr: 研究通过调整LPCVD沉积气体流量改变SiNx薄膜化学计量比，发现非化学计量比SiNx作为阻变材料可改善MIS RRAM器件的SET/RESET电压和SET时间，其中富硅薄膜具有最高的击穿加速因子。
AI.motivation: SiNx的微观结构受其化学计量比x影响显著，通过调整化学计量比可以调控缺陷形成（如氮空位、硅悬键等），从而实现对MIS RRAM器件性能的调谐。
AI.method: 通过LPCVD沉积调整气体流量制备不同化学计量比的SiNx薄膜；采用直流电学表征、阻抗谱和恒定电压应力测量研究其作为阻变材料的特性；通过施加电压斜坡测量每个器件的平均SET时间。
AI.result: 观察到SET/RESET电压和SET时间的改善；化学计量比薄膜表现出最低的击穿加速因子，而富硅薄膜具有最高的击穿加速因子。
AI.conclusion: 非化学计量比SiNx薄膜作为阻变材料能够有效改善RRAM器件性能，化学计量比调控是实现性能优化的有效途径，其中富硅薄膜在击穿特性方面表现出不同行为。

title: Breakdown characteristics of SiNx with different stoichiometries for resistive memories
summary: The breakdown characteristics of SiNx layers with different stoichiometries are explored. The stoichiometry of SiNx is modified by changing the gas flow rates during the LPCVD deposition. These layers are suitable for RRAM cells.

AI.motivation: 探索SiNx层的化学计量比对击穿特性的影响，为RRAM器件的材料选择和性能优化提供指导。
AI.method: 通过改变LPCVD沉积过程中的气体流量来制备不同化学计量比的SiNx层，然后研究这些层的击穿特性。
AI.result: 不同化学计量比的SiNx层表现出不同的击穿特性，表明化学计量比对材料性能有显著影响。

title: Biaxial Strain Modulation of Exciton-Phonon Resonance in WS2
summary: Mechanical strain provides a powerful route to tune light-matter interactions in two-dimensional semiconductors, yet the impact of biaxial strain on resonant Raman scattering remains poorly quantified. Here we use a cruciform bending platform to apply uniform biaxial strain up to 1.3% to trilayer WS2 while simultaneously monitoring excitonic and vibrational responses. Differential reflectance reveals strain-induced red-shifts of the A and B excitons, with the B exciton moving by about 170 meV. Under 532 nm excitation, this shift drives a continuous transition from resonant to non-resonant Raman scattering, leading to a pronounced collapse of the 2LA(M) mode. The 2LA(M) intensity is quantitatively described by a resonance model expressed in terms of the B-exciton energy, which yields an effective exciton-assisted linewidth of about 34 meV and shows that the maximum enhancement occurs when the laser lies roughly 50 meV below the exciton. The first-order phonons remain narrow and reversible over the full strain cycle, confirming elastic deformation and efficient isotropic strain transfer. Our results establish biaxial strain as a practical and reversible route to modulate exciton-phonon coupling and Raman scattering cross-sections, enabling mechanically reconfigurable optical and photonic functionalities in layered semiconductors.

AI.tldr: 双轴应变可调控WS2三层的激子-声子耦合与拉曼散射截面，通过弯曲平台实现高达1.3%的均匀应变，观察到B激子红移170 meV导致2LA(M)拉曼模式显著衰减。
AI.motivation: 双轴应变对二维半导体中光-物质相互作用有重要影响，但双轴应变对共振拉曼散射的影响尚未得到充分量化研究。
AI.method: 使用十字形弯曲平台对WS2三层施加高达1.3%的均匀双轴应变，同时监测激子和振动响应，通过微分反射谱和532 nm激发拉曼散射进行分析。
AI.result: 应变导致A和B激子红移，B激子移动约170 meV；532 nm激发下从共振到非共振拉曼散射的连续转变导致2LA(M)模式显著衰减；一阶声子在整个应变循环中保持窄且可逆。
AI.conclusion: 双轴应变是调控层状半导体中激子-声子耦合和拉曼散射截面的实用可逆途径，可实现机械可重构的光学和光子功能。

title: Resistance Switching Properties of Stoichiometric and Nitrogen Implanted Silicon Nitride Nanolayers on N and P-Type Si Substrates
summary: This paper examines the resistive switching characteristics of LPCVD SiNx MNOS ReRAM cells on both heavily doped n- and p-type silicon substrates, focusing on the effects of nitrogen doping. Detailed comparisons of electrical properties through nitrogen implantation reveal variations in trap density and SET-RESET voltages between n and p conductivity Si substrates. Impedance spectroscopy further elucidates the conductive path formation and its resistance.

AI.motivation: 探究不同导电类型硅衬底（n型和p型）对SiNx MNOS ReRAM性能的影响，特别是氮掺杂如何改变器件的电学特性
AI.method: 使用LPCVD制备SiNx MNOS ReRAM器件，在重掺杂n型和p型硅衬底上进行氮离子注入掺杂，通过电学特性测试比较陷阱密度和SET-RESET电压差异，并采用阻抗谱分析导电路径形成和电阻

AI.conclusion: 硅衬底的导电类型对SiNx MNOS ReRAM的阻变特性有重要影响，氮掺杂是调控器件性能的关键因素，为优化ReRAM设计提供了重要参考

title: A Rapid-prototyping CMOS-RRAM Integration Strategy
summary: Moore's law has long served the semiconductor industry as the driving force for producing ever-advancing electronics technologies. However, given the economic implications and technological challenges associated with the present semiconductor scaling constraints, a shift from a traditional more Moore approach to a beyond Moore paradigm is desirable for sustaining the current pace of innovation beyond the established development route. Resistive random-access memories (RRAM) are one such beyond Moore technology that offers many avenues for innovation, and when integrated with mature complementary metal oxide semiconductors (CMOS), can extend CMOS capabilities in a scalable and power-efficient manner, both in terms of memory and computation. Nevertheless, as emerging and established technologies fuse, existing semiconductor-optimised manufacturing faces significant challenges, while the methodologies and complexities of integration are often not highlighted in depth, or overlooked at the expense of demonstrating the application-specific integrated-technologies. In this article, we focus on the integration, and detail a cost-effective, rapid-prototyping, and technology agnostic CMOS-RRAM integration strategy that employs hybridised wafer-level and multi-reticle processing techniques, supported by a systematic increased complexity approach. Leveraging the fact that CMOS technologies can be readily realised by taking advantage of mature front-end-of-line fabrication processes offered by semiconductor foundries, we establish an in-house RRAM development program that allows to combine fundamental material and device-level knowledge with custom-designed CMOS electronics. This approach utilises fully CMOS-compatible and transferable processes, ultimately enabling a seamless transition from research and development to volume production.

AI.tldr: 提出一种成本效益高、快速原型化且技术无关的CMOS-RRAM集成策略，采用混合晶圆级和多光罩处理技术，支持系统化的复杂度递增方法。
AI.motivation: 摩尔定律面临经济和技术的双重挑战，需要从"更多摩尔"转向"超越摩尔"范式。RRAM作为超越摩尔技术，与成熟CMOS集成可扩展其能力，但现有制造方法面临挑战，集成方法常被忽视。
AI.method: 建立内部RRAM开发计划，结合基础材料/器件知识与定制CMOS电子设计。采用混合晶圆级和多光罩处理技术，使用完全CMOS兼容且可转移的工艺。
AI.result: 开发出成本效益高、快速原型化的技术无关集成策略，支持从研发到批量生产的无缝过渡。
AI.conclusion: 该集成方法能够有效融合新兴与成熟技术，克服现有半导体制造挑战，为超越摩尔范式提供可行的技术路径。

title: Linear and Nonlinear Optical Properties of SiO$_2$/TiO$_2$ Heterostructures Grown by Plasma Enhanced Atomic Layer Deposition
summary: Second harmonic (SH) radiation can only be generated in non-centrosymmetric bulk crystals under electric dipole approximation. Nonlinear thin films made from bulk crystals are technologically challenging because of complex and high temperature fabrication processes. In this work, heterostructures made of amorphous materials SiO$_2$ and TiO$_2$ were prepared by a CMOS-compatible technique named plasma enhanced atomic layer deposition (PEALD) with deposition temperature at 100 °C. By using the uniaxial dispersion model, we characterized the form-birefringence property, which can enable the phase matching condition in waveguides or other nonlinear optical applications. By applying a fringe-based technique, we determined the largest diagonal component of the effective second-order bulk susceptibility $χ_{zzz}^{(2)}$ = 1.30$\pm$0.13 pm/V at a wavelength of 1032 nm. Noteworthy, we observed strong SHG signals from two-component nanolaminates which are several orders of magnitude larger than from single layers. The SHG signals from our samples only require the broken inversion symmetry at the interface. Here optical properties of nanocomposites can be precisely tuned by the promising PEALD technology.

AI.tldr: 使用PEALD技术制备的SiO₂/TiO₂非晶异质结构在1032nm波长下实现了1.30±0.13 pm/V的有效二阶非线性系数，界面对称性破缺是产生强二次谐波的关键。
AI.motivation: 传统非线性晶体需要复杂的制备工艺且工作温度高，限制了其应用。本研究旨在开发一种CMOS兼容的低温制备方法，利用非晶材料界面效应实现高效二次谐波产生。
AI.method: 采用等离子体增强原子层沉积（PEALD）技术在100°C下制备SiO₂/TiO₂异质结构，使用单轴色散模型表征形式双折射特性，并通过条纹技术测量有效二阶非线性系数。
AI.result: 在1032nm波长下测得最大有效二阶非线性系数χ_{zzz}^{(2)} = 1.30±0.13 pm/V；双组分纳米层叠结构的二次谐波信号比单层结构强几个数量级；界面对称性破缺是产生非线性效应的关键机制。
AI.conclusion: PEALD技术可精确调控纳米复合材料的光学性质，通过界面工程实现高效二次谐波产生，为CMOS兼容的非线性光学器件开发提供了新途径。
